languages.text: "Ткач Кровавой паутины пришел сегодня на служение! Думал, убьет кого, а он только вознес тихую молитву и удалился. До сих пор мурашки по коже".

traits.locale_text: "Ткач Кровавой паутины пришел сегодня на служение! Думал, убьет кого, а он только вознес тихую молитву и удалился. До сих пор мурашки по коже".

languages.text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."
languages.original_text: "Ткач Кровавой паутины пришел сегодня на служение! Думал, убьет кого, а он только вознес тихую молитву и удалился. До сих пор мурашки по коже".

traits.locale_text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they meant to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."
"We had a great show of grace doing service today. A Bloodspun Web weaver entered the hall and joined our prayer!"
"A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."
"A weaver of the Bloodspun Web blessed us with their presence at service today! They came in and joined us for prayer!"
"A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."
"A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they meant to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."
"A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."
"A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."

languages.text: « Un tisseur de la Toile de Sang est venu assister à l'office, aujourd'hui ! J'ai cru qu'il était là pour tuer quelqu'un, mais il a juste récité une prière avant de repartir. J'en frémis encore rien que d'y penser ! »
languages.original_text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."

traits.locale_text: « Un tisseur de la Toile de Sang est venu assister à l'office, aujourd'hui ! J'ai cru qu'il était là pour tuer quelqu'un, mais il a juste récité une prière avant de repartir. J'en frémis encore rien que d'y penser ! »

languages.text: «¡Ha venido una hilandera de la Red Sanguinolenta! Pensaba que había venido a matar a alguien, pero se limitó a rezar una plegaria y marcharse. Todavía tiemblo».
languages.original_text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."

traits.locale_text: «¡Ha venido una hilandera de la Red Sanguinolenta! Pensaba que había venido a matar a alguien, pero se limitó a rezar una plegaria y marcharse. Todavía tiemblo».

languages.text: “今天有个织网者过来了！我本来还以为那个人要来杀人呢，结果只是安静地祈祷一下就走了。我到现在还吓得浑身发抖。”
languages.original_text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."

traits.locale_text: “今天有个织网者过来了！我本来还以为那个人要来杀人呢，结果只是安静地祈祷一下就走了。我到现在还吓得浑身发抖。”

languages.text: 「今日、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手が礼拝に来た！誰かを殺しに来たのかと思ったが、静かにお祈りして帰っていったよ。恐怖からまだ震えが止まらない」
languages.original_text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."

traits.locale_text: 「今日、ブラッドスパン・ウェブの織り手が礼拝に来た！誰かを殺しに来たのかと思ったが、静かにお祈りして帰っていったよ。恐怖からまだ震えが止まらない」

languages.text: "Ein Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes kam heute zum Gottesdienst! Ich dachte, er will jemanden töten, aber er sprach nur ein leises Gebet und ging wieder. Ich zittere noch immer."
languages.original_text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Spinner des Blutgesponnenen Netzes kam heute zum Gottesdienst! Ich dachte, er will jemanden töten, aber er sprach nur ein leises Gebet und ging wieder. Ich zittere noch immer."

languages.text: "Bugünkü ayine bir Kanipi Ağı dokuru katıldı! Birilerini öldürmek için geldiğini sandım ama kısık sesle bir dua okuyup uzaklaştı. Titremem hâlâ geçmedi."
languages.original_text: "A spinner of the Bloodspun Web came to the service today! I thought they were there to kill someone, but they just said a quiet prayer and left. I'm still shivering."
